Description.Metadata: A hard day's night / United Artist ; director, Richard Lester ; producer, Walter Shenson ; writer, Alun Owen.
Copyright notice on videodisc jacket: 1964 Proscenium Films, Ltd. ; 1987 The Criterion Collection.
Originally produced as motion picture in 1964.
Includes special features: Richard Lester's first film: The running jumping & standing still film; video interview with Richard Lester; theatrical trailer.
Sources used: videodisc jacket; New York times film review, 8/12/64; The films of Richard Lester, 1985, p. 164; Catalog of copyright entries, motion pictures, 1960-1969, p. 239.
John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, Ringo Starr.
Harassed by their manager and Paul's grandpa, the Beatles embark from Liverpool by train for a London TV show.
Received: bet. 1982 and 1990; viewing copy; purchase; LC Purchase Collection.
Received: 9/90; viewing copy, copy 2; copyright deposit--407; Copyright Collection.
LC Purchase Collection (Library of Congress) DLC
